title.en: Moto-Sekai Ichii Sub-chara Ikusei Nikki ~Hi-Player, Isekai wo Kouryaku-chu!~

altTitles.en: The Former Top 1's Sub-Character Training Diary: A Dedicated Player is Currently Conquering Another World!
The Former World Number 1's Alt Character Training Diary

altTitles.ja: 元・世界１位のサブキャラ育成日記～廃プレイヤー、異世界を攻略中！～

altTitles.ko: 전(前) 세계1위의 서브캐 육성일기~폐플레이어 이세계를 공략중!~

altTitles.ru: Дневник тренировок с нуля бывшего топ-1 игрока

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Sekai Ichi'i Subchara Ikusei Nikki: Hai Player, Isekai wo Kouryakuchuu!

description.en:
The protagonist who was rarely ever at school during his middle school and high school days, is unemployed even as an adult. From morning till night, it was video games. For him who was ranked first worldwide, it was his life.   
  
One day, his character is suddenly hacked. The data was unrecoverable and there was nothing that could be done. Feeling great despair at having lost his rank that he had bet everything to achieve in a world that controlled his life, the protagonist attempts suicide.   
  
When he awakens, he finds himself inside the video game, no, it was a real world that resembled it. There, he notices that he has reincarnated into the the body of a sub character that he had created and bought premium benefits for long ago but had left neglected.
description.ja: ネトゲに人生を賭け、世界ランキング1位に君臨していた佐藤。が、ある事をきっかけにゲームに似た世界へ転生してしまう！ ゲーム知識をフル活用して、愉快な仲間と共に0スタートから再び『世界1位』を目指す！
description.ru:
Главного героя довольно редко видели в средней и старшей школе. А всё потому, что с утра до ночи он был увлечён лишь видеоиграми. Так он стал лучшим в одной ММО, это была его жизнь. Однажды его персонажа внезапно взломали. Весь прогресс был потерян, вся жизнь оказалась прожита впустую... Но проснувшись, он оказывается в той самой игре, а в себе узнаёт давно забытого своего второго персонажа. И теперь ему предстоит прокачаться с нуля!

(Source: mangalib)

title.en: Kyuuseishu «Messiah» ~ Isekai wo Sukutta Motoyuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai wo Musou suru

altTitles.ja: 救世主《メシア》～異世界を救った元勇者が魔物のあふれる現実世界を無双する～

altTitles.en: The Savior «Messiah» ~ The Former Hero Who Saved Another World Beats the Real World Full of Monsters

altTitles.zh-hk: 救世主《彌賽亞》～現實世界無雙～

description.en: The "former" savior, Takeru Yamato, was summoned to another world and executed because of his strength. When he wakes up, he finds himself in Japan, where he spent time before being summoned. However, in the city, demons appearing from "gates" rampage, and those called hunters fight using magic. Returning from another world, Takeru decides to hide his powers and live, but...
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、その強さ故に処刑された「元」救世主・大和猛。 目を覚ますとそこは、召喚される前に過ごしていた日本だった。 しかし、街では”ゲート”から現れる魔物が暴れ、ハンターと呼ばれる者たちが魔術を用いて戦っていた。 異世界帰りの猛は、力を隠して暮らす事を決めるが――…。

title.en: Kimi Janakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo

altTitles.ja: 君じゃなきゃダメな奴隷少女

altTitles.th: ทาสสาวของผมคนเดียวเท่านั้น

altTitles.en: You're The Only Slave Girl

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ja Nakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo

description.en: Daito's your average high-school kid. After getting home one day, he finds a strange girl sleeping on the floor—only to find out she's a slave from another world. He decides to take her in so she can start life anew as a normal girl, beginning their sweet-but-unusual life together as they navigate cultural barriers.

altTitles.en: Daily Chaldea

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.en: Ginga Legend Weed
Silver Fang Legend Weed

altTitles.ja: 銀牙伝説WEED
銀牙伝説ウィード

description.en:
A dog named Weed happens to hear he is the son of Gin, the great leader of Ohu, who lead the dogs of Ohu to victory in a fight against the monstrous bear Akakabuto.   
Weed wants to find his father no matter what.   
On his way to find him, Weed hears that his father has been captured by a ruthless villain called Hougen.  
  
Sequel to Ginga Nagareboshi Gin.

altTitles.en: Apocalypse Jigsaw Puzzle

description.en:
The tower that symbolizes the pearl of the end times,

the monstrous monsters outside the tower that are attracted by evil thoughts,

the gambling of the superiors, 

the perils of the explorers, 

the traps in the end times, 

the moment the white mist wakes up, 

the game begins.
description.zh: 象征末世明珠的高塔，被恶念吸引的塔外畸变怪物，上位者的赌局，探索者的险境，末日中的陷阱，在白雾醒来的那一刻，游戏开始了。

altTitles.ja: デカいはちの話

description.en: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

title.en: Death March kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku

altTitles.en: Death March to the Parallel World Rhapsody
Death Marching to the Parallel World Rhapsody

altTitles.ru: Марш смерти в рапсодию параллельного мирa

altTitles.th: โศกนาฏกรรมต่างโลกเริ่มต้นจากเดธมาร์ช

altTitles.ja: デスマーチからはじまる異世界狂想曲

altTitles.zh: 从死亡之旅开始的异世界狂想曲

description.en: 29-year-old programmer Suzuki Ichirou finds himself transported into a fantasy RPG. Within the game, he's a 15-year-old named Satou. At first he thinks he's dreaming, but his experiences seem very real. Due to his use of a 3-time-use special power (meteor shower), he ends up wiping out an army of lizardmen and becoming very high level. He hides his level and plans to live peacefully and meet new people, though developments in the game story (like the return of a demon king) might get in his way.
description.pt-br: Suzuki Ichirou é um programado de 29 anos que subitamente fora levado a um mundo diferente, trajando apenas roupas comum e no level 1. Ele obteve um nível elevado e inúmeros tesouros após utilizar 3 vezes uma habilidade descartável, [Meteor Shower], chuva de meteoros. Após superar essa crise, ele decidiu realizar um "Turismo em outro mundo? Superando adversidades, fazendo amigos, obtendo companheiros, ocasionalmente derrotando demônios, lordes demônios e pessoas mal-intencionadas, Satou aproveita o seu dia-a-dia nesta calorosa história de fantasia.

altTitles.ja: ケンガンオメガ

description.en: Sequel to Kengan Asura. Takes place 2 years after the tournament.

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

altTitles.en: Napoleon

altTitles.ja-ro: Napoleon - Shishi no Jidai

altTitles.ja: ナポレオン 獅子の時代

description.en: This is a story of the life of Napoleon. The tale begins just before the Battle of Austerlitz. Then, it jumps back to 1769 to tell the story of Napoleon's life from the very beginning, including the circumstances of his birth, his childhood on Corsica, and his difficulties as a Corsican boy in a French school. All of these experiences eventually culminate in his becoming the famous Emperor of the French.
description.ja: フランス革命に始まり、イタリア戦役を経て、皇帝への道を駆け進む一人の英雄ナポレオン・ボナパルトの生涯を描く、壮大な英雄譚!!　血みどろ汗の臭いムンムンな一人の「漢」が、獅子のごとく吠える。吼える！　フランス近代史重厚ストーリー!!

altTitles.en: Syeimlum
셰임룸

description.en:
Wooyeon and his ex-stepsister Se-myung have been kidnapped. They awake in Shame Room, where they must complete a series of embarrassing missions in order to escape. As the pair lick, tug, suck and thrust their way through ever stranger and more perverted missions, how close will they become? Will their desires get the better of them? And will they ever get out?  
  
(Source: Lezhin)

altTitles.en: The Chaebeol's Youngest Son
The Youngest Son of Sunyang
Youngest Son of the Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

altTitles.ja: 財閥家の末息子

altTitles.th: รีบอร์นริช

altTitles.fr: Le plus jeune petit fils du conglomérat

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Ibun - Makoku Kurashi no Trinity

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Trinity in Tempest

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件 異聞 ～魔国暮らしのトリニティ～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Slime datta Ken Ibun: Makoku Gurashi no Trinity

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime Another Story: Trinity of the Magic Kingdom
That Time I Was Reincarnated as a Slime Strange Report: Tempest Life of Trinity

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Kudan Ibun ~ Ma-koku Kurashi no Trinity ~
Tensura: Makoku Gurashi no Trinity

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم: الثلاثي في تيمبيست

description.en:
This Spinoff Manga has content based on Volumes 4,5,6 and 7 of the Light Novel.

Against the odds, the little slime Rimuru has established Tempest, his magical country for all monsters, and it’s thriving. Three visitors, Phos the fox girl, Stella the dragon girl, and Nemu the winged girl, come to pay Tempest a visit, and they’re stunned at just how quickly it’s developed.

altTitles.en: Beethoven Born Again

description.en: Only music sustained me from the maddening pain. If only I could hear my music... with my own ears... Even as my soul was falling apart, I prayed to God... and prayed again. Ludwig van Beethoven is considered the greatest composer in human history. I closed my eyes like that. And 180 years later in Seoul. The saint of music, known as an immortal genius, has been reborn. <Beethoven Born Again> And then I began to hear the voice of an angel. "Dobin.. Dobin.." Only music sustained me from the maddening pain.
description.id: Hanya musik yang menopangku dari rasa sakit yang menjengkelkan. Andai saja aku bisa mendengarkan musikku… dengan telingaku sendiri… Bahkan ketika jiwaku sedang hancur sekalipun, aku tetap akan berdoa kepada Tuhan… dan berdoa lagi. Ludwig van Beethoven dianggap sebagai komposer terhebat dalam sejarah manusia. Aku menutup mataku seperti itu. Dan 180 tahun kemudian di Seoul. Sang Saint musik, yang dikenal sebagai seorang jenius abadi, telah terlahir kembali. Dan kemudian tiba-tiba aku mulai mendengar suara malaikat. “Dobin.. Dobin..” …

altTitles.en: Tales of a Shining Sword
Moonlight Sword
Hwiyeong Sword

description.en:
Eunho, the strongest in the yokai realm!
He gained the chance to become a human being after losing the woman he loved and killing countless yokai.
After passing the gate of reincarnation by accumulating merit for a thousand years to abandon his immortal body…

He became a human being, held a sword, and learned martial arts for the first time.
But this is very… easy?

altTitles.en: To My Juliet Boy

description.en: Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock!

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！

description.en:
Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.ja: Over Drive Girls
超可動ガールズ

description.en:
Translated from Amazon.com.jp using google translate.

The latest work in the "Super Movable Girl" series, in which a moving beautiful girl figure rushes in and becomes a wife. A romantic comedy in which tiny cute [super movable girls] such as the girl-type planet explorer Nona, the RPG hero Bernoa, and the 2D fighting game character Subaru are involved in the otaku boy Haruto. If there is love, what is the size difference!?

title.en: Tensei Shite Inaka de Slowlife wo Okuritai

altTitles.en: I want a slow life in the countryside after reincarnation
I want to enjoy slow living

altTitles.ja: 転生して田舎でスローライフをおくりたい

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生之後我想要在田園過慢生活

altTitles.ru: После перерождения я хочу жить спокойной жизнью в деревне

altTitles.zh: 转生之后我想要在田园过慢生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei shite Inaka de Slow Life wo Okuritai

description.en:
The protagonist, Inaka Yuuji, was ran over by a truck because his awareness was dulled from overworking.  
  
“Ahー, with this I don’t have to work so much anymore. I want to spend my next life leisurely……” was the wish Yuuji blurted out, He met God and it was decided he will be reincarnated in the countryside of the other world. He became Alfred Slowlet, 2nd son of a countryside noble, will he be able to enjoy and leisurely spend his slow life in the countryside?

altTitles.ja: 当て屋の椿

altTitles.ja-ro: Ate-ya no Tsubaki

altTitles.en: Hot Detective Tsubaki

altTitles.ja-ro: Ateya no Tsubaki

altTitles.en: Tsubaki the Hope Seller

description.en:
Housen is an Edo period erotic painter, who stumbles into a murder mystery involving women who hooked up with one of his patrons. 
With the help of Tsubaki, a girl he runs into on the street who seems to know more about him than he does and is an artist herself, they start unraveling mysteries involving sex, murder, and occasionally the occult…

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon
Skeleton Soldier

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

altTitles.en: The Law Of Being Friends With A Male
Boyfriend's Rule

altTitles.ja: 男友達って彼氏になれる?

altTitles.en: Boy-Friend's Rule

description.en: Jay is a guy that wanted to talk with his friend about their secret crushes, When Jay was about to confess who he has a crush on, his friend Jiwoon, who’s crush is actually towards Jay, was hopefull that Jay was going to confess his feelings towards her. But she felt shocked when she learned that actually Jay’s crush was someone else, after that, Jay asked her about her crush, Jiwoon tried to avoid the question and gave him a vague description which caused a misunderstanding that his crush was actually towards Jay’s friend Seohyun. She and Jay are just good friends without anything romantic going on between them, The way Jay interacts with her is just in a friendly manner and tries to help her to get her “crush”….Let the romantic drama begin at school!
description.fr: La première romance de Jiun s'est terminée lorsque son béguin, Jae-i, lui avoue qu'il aime quelqu'un d'autre. Pour aggraver les choses, Jae-i croit à tort que le béguin de Jiun est son effrayant meilleur ami, Seohyeon, et il tente de l'aider à gagner le cœur de celui-ci. Maintenant, Jiun doit faire face à un plus gros problème qu'un amour à sens unique, le petit-copain qu'elle n'a jamais imaginé se rapprocher.
description.ko:
남몰래 '재이'를 짝사랑해온 '지운'.  재이가 자신에게 고백할 줄 알았던 지운은, 재이의 짝사랑 상대가 다른 사람이라는 사실을 알고는 정신이 아득해진다. 
짝사랑이 허무하게 끝났다고 생각함과 동시에, 재이가 자신의 짝사랑 상대를 '서현'이라고 착각하고 있다는 걸 알게 된다. 
그저 재이의 키 크고 덩치 큰 친구 중 하나일 뿐인, 말 그대로 남자인 사람 친구일 뿐인 서현과 자신을 이어주려는 재이의 행동에 해탈하고 마는데...

A series of different yandere images by the artist @RinRin200001.

altTitles.ja: こまえーきイチャイチャ漫画

description.en: Being an Elite Nanny is simple: protect the charge, obey the principle, and don’t get emotionally attached. Easier said than done when Davina’s first client is a dangerously compelling Venetian underboss who’s determined to get under her skin. What he wants from her, she can’t imagine, but Gabriel Angelini drags her back into the glittering world of organized crime she thought she’d left behind forever. She might get answers about her past if she digs deep enough, but can she protect Mikey from his father’s ambitions and keep her heart from getting tangled up in their treacherous web?

altTitles.ru: Добро пожаловать на лифт в ад!

altTitles.ja: 双子に縛られて

description.en: Spying on your classmates doesn't end well... or does it? A guy in whose head two things took precedence over everyone else: women's foots and photography, and what next...

altTitles.ja: ガチ恋魔王様

description.en: A hero undertakes the task of defeating the Demon Lord for the sake of world peace. When he arrives at the Demon Lord's castle, he is greeted by the Demon Lord with a marriage certificate in her hand! The hero is bewildered by the Demon Lord's strong appeal to marry him, but...? A love comedy about a die-hard-fan Demon Lord and an overly prickly hero whose world is in danger of extinction!
description.pt-br: Um herói assume a tarefa de derrotar o Rei Demônio pelo bem da paz mundial. Quando ele chega ao castelo da Maou, ele é saudado pela Maou com uma certidão de casamento na mão! O herói fica perplexo com o forte apelo da Maou para se casar com ele, mas…? Uma comédia de amor sobre uma Maou amorosa e um herói amargurado cujo mundo está em perigo de extinção!

title.en: Suterare Elf-san wa Sekai de Ichiban Tsuyokute Kawaii!

altTitles.en: The Abandoned Elf is the Strongest and Cutest in the World!

description.en: “Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted.” Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to “clear the game” in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but –!?

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.ja: あした目が醒めたら
ぎゅぎゅっと高橋

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyugyutto Takahashi

altTitles.ja: はじめての星栽

altTitles.ja-ro: Hajimete no Seisai

description.en:
Videogames x Showa Culture x Glamour! A voluptuous and fascinating book for those that enjoy the Showa Era and playing video games! A large collection of stories, published in Harta by Benitsubaki's author, Takahashi Hirona, all in one volume!

Two glamorous folk tales, including "Glamorous-suteyama", a glamorous rearrangement of the Ubasuteyama legend!
When a witch fostering a planet sprays it with some water, torrential rains begin to pour from above in "My first planet"
"Shiramari" is a super idol whose singing voice makes people so happy they could die!
And of course, the series of 16 shorts "It's okay to play games", the antithesis of being given a cold look while you're playing video games!

Full of bright, fantastical ideas, all these gems from Harta's new wave, Takahashi Hirona, in a single volume!

altTitles.ja: 悪女を殺して

altTitles.th: นางร้ายต้องสังหาร

description.en:
Eris Miserian just wants to die.

Being overworked and underappreciated in the real world wasn’t great, but living as the villainess in a romance novel is even worse. If Eris can die in the novel, she might be able to return to reality, but the story won’t let her. Desperate to escape a life as the protagonist’s tormentor, she sets off on a journey with the help of a witch, a knight, and a high priest. Can she find her way back to her friends and family, or is Eris doomed to a fictional future?

---
Official Translations:
* [French](https://cdn.fr.piccoma.com/parking/static-error-page/error.html?message=restricted1)
* [Indonesiah](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kill-the-Villainess/3506)
* [Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72166)
* [S. Chinese](https://m.kuaikanmanhua.com/mobile/11318/list/)
* [T. Chinese](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%AE%BA%E6%AD%BB%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3/142)
* [Thai](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3/229)
description.ru:
Она перевоплотилась в злодейку из романа.  
Эрис испила яд, когда ее бывший жених, наследный принц, женился на ее подруге детства, служанке Елене. Когда я осознала, что произошло, у меня появилась только одна цель: сбежать из этого вымышленного мира. Но мир не позволил, и мне пришлось измениться. Это привело к тому, что те, кто игнорировал оригинальную Эрис, вдруг стали выпрашивать внимания и ласки у "новой" ее.  
— Кто ты? — спросил святой, который лелеял Елену.  
— Ты… ты действительно Эрис? — спросил воин, который поклялся в вечной верности Елене.  
— …Ты изменилась, — сказал даже принц, который отверг оригинальную Эрис ради Елены.  
Это странно. Все вы никогда не интересовались Эрис, так почему делаете это сейчас? Но даже так, я не стану привязываться, сколько бы времени ни прошло. Я никогда не полюблю этот мир.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%A5%BC-%EC%A3%BD%EC%97%AC-%EC%A4%98/54115473)

altTitles.ja: パンプキンナイト

description.en: A deformed female human goes out with a pumpkin on her head to kill all those who bullied her in the past after escaping from a mental hospital.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

title.en: P.S. Waiting for You by the Lake

altTitles.en: Leo

description.en: Leo and Alexis lived in the same small town when they were kids and were best buddies. The two loved to spend their summers at the Green Rock Lake summer camp near town. But during the summer when they were eleven, Alexis ended his friendship with Leo over a stupid reason. After that, the two did not see each other again because of their families' situation. But during the summer when they were eighteen, the two met once again at Green Rock Lake...

title.en: Yuki no Niizuma wa Boku to Tokeaitai

altTitles.ja: 雪の新妻は僕と溶け合いたい

altTitles.en: My New Snow Bride Wants To Melt Together With Me

altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวหิมะมือใหม่ อยากหลอมรวมใจไปกับผม

description.en:
From the same author who made Renai Boukun and many others!

Yusuke Sakanoi is a young man who earns a living as a part-timer. One day he is rescued by a mysterious beauty when he was lying down due to a heat stroke. Yusuke started looking for her to return her lost hat, but when he managed to find her, she was standing in a brothel!? Her name is Ginka, she is a Yuki-Onna who came to the city in search of a husband and was going to work at the brothel, a secret feeding ground for the Yuki-Onna! In an interesting turn of events, she and Yusuke somehow become a couple…?! What is Yusuke's fate?!

A cute and sexually knowledgeable Yuki-Onna and a part-timer. This is a newlywed romantic comedy!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/49466)
description.id:
Suatu hari, seorang pemuda, Sakanoi Yusuke, yang mencari nafkah sebagai pekerja paruh waktu, diselamatkan dari sengatan panas oleh kecantikan misterius.  
 Sakanoi mencarinya. Dia berhasil menemukannya, tapi dia berada di soapland.  
 Namanya Ginka. Dia adalah Yuki onna pemula yang datang ke kota untuk mencari roh dan suaminya di Soapland, Soapland adalah tempat makan bagi Yuki onna!  
 Entah bagaimana,dia dan Ginka bakal menikah untuk pertama kalinya …? Bagaimana nasib Yusuke?  
  
  
Ini adalah kisah tentang wanita salju yang lucu berpengetahuan luas dan pasangan semu! Komedi cinta yang sedikit nakal dan mengerikan tentang pengantin baru!

altTitles.ja: 恋するサイコの白雪くん

description.en:
I will kill everyone for your sake.

"Hey, I think I like you!" Shirayuki says with a smile.
Haruki endures relentless bullying from a trio of classmates. One day, a beautiful transfer student named Shirayuki suddenly approaches him and asks if he would date him if the bullying stopped. Haruki dismisses it as a joke. But the next day, one of his tormentors disappears. Then another. One thing's for sure—Shirayuki is a psychopath that lacks common sense and empathy.
description.es:
Mataré a todos por tu bien.

«¡Eh, creo que me gustas!» Shirayuki dice con una sonrisa.
Haruki soporta el acoso implacable de un grupo de compañeros de clase. Un día, un hermoso estudiante trasladado llamado Shirayuki se le acerca de repente y le pregunta si saldría con él si cesara el acoso. Haruki lo toma a broma. Pero al día siguiente, uno de sus acosadores desaparece, y luego otro y después otro. Una cosa es seguro: Shirayuki es una psicópata que carece de sentido común y empatía.
description.ja: 「僕、キミのこと好きになっちゃったかもしれない」そう言って白雪は微笑んだ。同級生３人に壮絶なイジメを受けていた晴樹は、ある日突然転校してきた美少年、白雪に「イジメがなくなったら僕と付き合ってくれる？」と持ち掛けられる。冗談だと聞き流した晴樹だったが、次の日から同級生が一人、また一人と姿を消していく。恋した転校生の白雪は、サイコパスだった。
description.vi:
Tôi sẽ giết tất cả mọi người vì cậu.

"Này, hình như tôi thích cậu mất rồi!" Shirayuki mỉm cười nói.
Haruki đã phải chịu đựng bắt nạt không ngớt bởi bộ ba bắt nạt cầm đầu lớp. Bổng một ngày, Shirayuki, một học sinh chuyển trường xinh đẹp đột nhiên xuất hiện tiếp cận Haruki và hỏi liệu cậu sẽ hẹn hò với cậu ấy nếu việc bắt nạt chấm dứt. Haruki bác bỏ và chỉ coi đó là trò đùa cho đến ngày hôm sau, một trong số kẻ bắt nạt biến mất và lần lượt từng người một. Chỉ có một điều chắc chắn rằng - Shirayuki là một tên tâm thần thiếu nhận thức thông thường và sự đồng cảm.
description.es-la:
Mataré a todos por tu bien.

«¡Eh, creo que me gustas!» Shirayuki dice con una sonrisa.
Haruki soporta el acoso implacable de un grupo de compañeros de clase. Un día, un hermoso estudiante trasladado llamado Shirayuki se le acerca de repente y le pregunta si saldría con él si cesara el acoso. Haruki lo toma a broma. Pero al día siguiente, uno de sus acosadores desaparece, y luego otro y después otro. Una cosa es seguro: Shirayuki es una psicópata que carece de sentido común y empatía.

Promise of 12cm with Cool Girl

description.en:
A boyish childhood friend grows up to be a super hot girl!

---

Serialization of the Twitter webcomic *[A Story About Becoming Cooler Than the Cool Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/d0407445-b80d-4854-9f12-c8227f94cba6/)*.

altTitles.ja: ウイニング パス

description.en: Haruto Ichinose has an older brother, Shori Ichinose, who has excellent grades, is a basketball prodigy, and is very popular in school. Although he says he hates basketball, he trains alone and challenges his brother, only to be beaten back. On the other hand, his older brother Shori seems to recognize his "talent" more than anyone else, but who is he really...?
description.ja: 成績優秀、バスケは天才的、そして校内の人気者・一ノ瀬翔麗を兄に持つ一ノ瀬陽斗。バスケは大嫌いと言いつつ、一人特訓して兄に挑戦しては返り討ちに遭う日々。一方で兄・翔麗は誰よりも陽斗の「才能」を認めている様子だが、その正体は…!?
description.pt-br: Haruto Ichinose tem um irmão mais velho, Shori Ichinose, que tem notas excelentes, é um prodígio do basquete e é muito popular na escola. Embora Haruto diga que odeia basquete, ele treina sozinho e desafia seu irmão, apenas para ser derrotado. Por outro lado, seu irmão mais velho Shori parece reconhecer seu "talento" mais do que qualquer outra pessoa, mas quem ele realmente é...?

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.ja-ro: Exorcist wo Otosenai

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.en: It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

description.en: A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.
description.pl: Mangowa adaptacja powieści napisanej przez Maruto Fumiaki. Twórcą tej adaptacji jest Yom, mangaka z Ganbare, Douki-chan.

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

altTitles.en: Centuria

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

title.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Taster

altTitles.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Detector
I Will Become a Poison Detector in the Dark World
I Will Become a Poison Detector of Darkness

altTitles.zh: 完蛋！成了反派的试毒小跟班

description.en:
I, an innocent office worker, possessed a character in the devastating novel *The Poisoned Apple*. On top of that, I'm Giselle Lloydsvin, a villainess who gets poisoned to death before being hanged! But the poison brought by the assassins doesn't work? It even tastes like fruit!

"You'll be okay since it's only a little bit, so hurry and drink it."

…Even though I possessed someone, it seems my destiny is to be tormented by a crazy assassin. 

However, "Leniel", who I thought was just a crazy assassin, turns out to be the frontman for the final villain, "Wayne Ayore"?!

In order to hold onto this lifeline, I clung to the villain in *The Poisoned Apple*. 

"I can distinguish the taste of poison."

“Poison?”

“Yes.”

“What use is that?”

“Your boss is going to be poisoned, so I can be his poison taster.”

And so, I thought I could survive well as a general store employee of the villain’s frontman(?)... 

“My boss is so strong to the point that there’s something suspicious about him!”

…Why does it feel like I’m doomed in this life too?

altTitles.en: Hectopascals

description.en:
Park Han-jun, once called a legend, was frustrated because he had nothing to lose anymore is given a huge amount of money.

An eye for an eye. An eye for a tooth! I’ll make you pay for what I’ve gone through!

As his rage explodes, he’ll get his sweet revenge and make them pay as much as they deserve!

title.en: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！マスターオブガーデン～七陰列伝～

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow: Master of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~

description.en:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the "The Eminence in Shadow" setting in a different world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called "Seven Shadows" (they are very serious). Then the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The strongest of the seven (& the main character), overwhelmingly chuunibyou, and misunderstood serious comedy!?

altTitles.en: The Young Witch Wants To Have Sex?!

altTitles.ja: おぼこい魔女はまじわりたい!

altTitles.zh-hk: 想和見習魔女深入交流！

altTitles.vi: Cô Phù Thủy Trẻ Muốn Được Sex!

description.en: Hiiragi visits Chikage Komori, a transfer student that has never come to school. His chastity is at stake when he comes across a beautiful girl that is wearing nothing but a jacket!?
description.ja: 古森チカゲ。転校生なのに一度も登校した姿を見たことがない彼女のご近所に住む柊木は学校のプリントを届けにいくが、出会った瞬間にいきなりカラダの関係を迫られて!?

title.en: Nageki no Bourei wa Intai Shitai

altTitles.ja: 嘆きの亡霊は引退したい 〜最弱ハンターによる最強パーティ育成術〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Nageki no Bourei wa Intai Shitai - Saijaku Hunter ni Yoru Saikyou Party Ikuseijutsu

altTitles.en: Let This Grieving Soul Retire! - Woe Is the Weakling Who Leads the Strongest Party

altTitles.pt: O fantasma da lamentação quer se aposentar - A técnica mais forte de treinamento partidário pelos caçadores mais fracos

altTitles.ko: 비탄의 망령은 은퇴하고 싶어 ~최약 헌터에 의한 최강 파티 육성술~

altTitles.zh: 叹息的亡灵好想隐退~最弱猎手的最强队伍养成术~

altTitles.zh-hk: 嘆息的亡靈好想隱退~最弱獵手的最强隊伍養成術~

description.en:
The golden age of treasure hunters who seek wealth, honor, power and glory, and explore dungeons around the world without regard to the danger.  
  
"Lets be treasure hunters," said Cry Andolihy, who swore an oath with his childhood friends to become the strongest … but he discovered during his first quest that he has no talent.  
  
But that was only the beginning of his adventure.  
  
"I can't do this anymore. I want to quit."  
  
"Oh, I see. In other words, we should fight harder and cover for you, that's a good handicap."  
"Rest assured, Cry. We'll protect you!"  
"Oh, wait. If you step on that, the trap will destroy you without leaving a speck of dust behind. Be careful, Leader!"  
  
Protected by his overpowered childhood friends, sought out by newbies and nobles, they aim to be heroes and find powerful treasures.  
  
Will Cry really be able to retire safely from being a Treasure Hunter?

[Alt Official English](https://global.bookwalker.jp/series/276659/)
description.pt:
A idade de ouro dos caçadores de tesouros que buscam riqueza, honra, poder e glória, e exploram tesouros ao redor do mundo sem levar em conta o perigo.   
"Vamos nos tornar um caçadores de tesouros", disse Cri Andrich, que fez um juramentocom seu um amigo de infância que iria se tornar o herói mais forte, mas não tinha talento.   
No entanto, a avaliação do entorno é de alguma forma alta por algum motivo, e apenas as expectativas estão saltando todos os dias.   
Toda vez que um amigo distante da raça humana entra em fúria, subir é uma habilidade de se sentar à terra! ”Uma   
fantasia cômica popular equivocada finalmente se torna realidade  
  
  
**Link :**  
- [WN Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6093en/)

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

altTitles.ja-ro: Nekotete

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya-san Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

description.en: Masachika Kuze sits next to Alya, a girl of Russian and Japanese descent. She’s beautiful, haughty, and an exceptional student, while Masachika is nerdy and known for being a slacker. He’s an easy target for her comments in Russian, which she’s all too happy to translate—except he can understand what she’s really saying!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.
